comments.body:
Hello, 

Currently, Appcelerator doesn't support Windows phone module development (only iOS and Android). The link you provided is deprecated and no longer support the latest release. But you can make direct API calls in Windows platform.  http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Windows_Runtime_Direct_API_Access

Please feel free to reply with anything you need. 

Regards,
Sharif
